room_title: Escape room "The Banishing" by Escape USA in Atlanta
room_description:
Chestnut Hill Manor has been associated with countless disappearances, murders, and suicides, and as a result, is widely regarded as the most haunted house in Douglasville. The manor was the last known whereabouts of renowned paranormal investigator, Fred Smith who went missing after heading into the house to spend a weekend recording paranormal activity.
You and your team of investigators now have one hour to explore the house, uncover any secrets it may hold, attempt to discover what happened to Fred Smith, and escape before the evil within the manor has a chance to capture your souls.
